price: Isaan amananii toltuuwwan hojjatan mindeessuuf jecha (Qiyaamaan dhufti). Warri sun araaramaafi hiree gaarii ta’etu isaaniif jira.
arabic: لِّيَجۡزِيَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِۚ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ لَهُم مَّغۡفِرَةٞ وَرِزۡقٞ كَرِيمٞ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: liyajziya alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti ulāika lahum maghfiratun wariz'qun karīmun
